item.title: Time is short for an ACA premium fix in the shutdown fight, says GOP insurance leader

item.title: Exposure to bright light can help fend off winter blues. The time to start is now
item.description: As daylight diminishes people can feel their mood dimming. Experts say starting light therapy in the fall can help fend off winter depression.

item.title: The CDC still hasn't issued COVID vaccine guidelines, leaving access in limbo

item.title: What's behind the health care fight that led to the government shutdown
item.description: It's Obamacare health insurance prices — and how much help 24 million Americans will get with their premiums — that are in dispute.
